With superior incense, flowers, food, drink, lamps, and light,

Have the painter observe the eight precepts, bathe, and wear new clean clothes.
Take uncut white cotton cloth to paint the image.
Do not use animal glue in the colors.
In the center, paint ÅšÄkyamuni Buddha in the appearance of expounding the Dharma.

Her right hand is in the gesture of granting wishes, and her left hand holds an open lotus flower.
Having obtained the painted image, place it in a pure place.
Make offerings to the Buddha and the Goddess of Auspiciousness with perfumed ointments, flower garlands, incense, food, drink, and lamps.
The practitioner should not give rise to fear with a lowly mind.
